title.narrative: Zales A/S: Partner identification and feasibility study

description.narrative:
DBP support to undertake preparatory activities for the establishment of an international call centre in Kenya by meeting with partners and selecting the most relevant local partner to work with in this project. The intention is to establish a local company called ZyberCall EPZ Ltd , an international call centre delivering high skilled services and results at competitive prices for particularly European and American companies and organisations. The projects aims to target the most interesting clients, including top 1000 companies all over the world and compete with other established call centre from e.g. India, Pakistan etc by offering more advantages including better-trained, motivated and skilled agents, speaking fluent English, a better time zone for European countries.
The project aims to create a minimum of 30 employees after the first year of operation and 50-100 employees after two years of operation.
